articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

articles.title: Posts
articles.contents:
Welcome
The purpose of this site is to disseminate relevant information about Ward 5 and UP. There are two main types of writings: “issues” and “notes.” “Issues” will be a limited number of posts on more complicated subjects that will be updated over time. The idea is to get a better understanding of the issue. “Notes” are one-off short postings on a variety of topics.
Posts are be written by the Ward 5 Councilmember, David McGaughey. I welcome content / suggestions from you all.

articles.title: Issues
articles.contents: This page tracks more complicated issues that benefit from some long term tracking.

articles.title: Notes
articles.contents: Here is a collection of “one off” posts
